body_content.explanation: a treatment for women whose levels of female hormones are low because they have reached the menopause (= the time in a woman’s life when blood stops flowing from her uterus permanently)
a treatment given to transgender people (= people whose gender does not match the body they were born with) to help their body develop some physical characteristics that match their gender identity:
examples: Transition may include a variety of medical treatments, including hormone replacement therapy and surgery.
